document.full_text: 'bring us the head of your daughter,' from the frisky downtown troupe the amoralists, doesn't make much dramatic capital from its outrageous conceit.
document.title: theater review | 'bring us the head of your daughter': their bright teenager is a cannibal
lines_and_colors: 'bring us the head of your daughter,' from the frisky downtown troupe the amoralists, doesn't make much dramatic capital from its outrageous conceit.
